definitions.text: the property resulting from being or relating to the greater in number of two parts; the main part
examples: the majority of his customers prefer it
the bulk of the work is finished

definitions.text: the property of something that is great in magnitude
examples: it is cheaper to buy it in bulk
he received a mass of correspondence

definitions.text: the property possessed by a large mass

examples: The parcel bulked in the sack

definitions.text: cause to bulge or swell outwards
